price: Naam! Na hakika mtakuwa katika watu wa mbele.
arabic: قَالَ نَعَمۡ وَإِنَّكُمۡ إِذٗا لَّمِنَ ٱلۡمُقَرَّبِينَ
footnotes: Firauni akasema: Naam, mtapata mnacho kisema. Na juu ya huo ujira mkubwa mtakuwa watu wa karibu kwangu, watu wa cheo na madaraka.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla naʿam wa-innakum idhan lamina al-muqarabīna
translations: the ones who are brought near
